metadata.description: Indie comics' most sex-positive, lady-friendly, dirty little mini is back as a FULL-SIZED ANTHOLOGY!  Smut Peddler began life in 2003 as a digest-sized minicomic, published by Saucy Goose Press.  There were three volumes of those fun, beautiful, erotic comics, followed by a years-long publishing hiatus...  Until now!
metadata.name: Smut Peddler
